video.title: ソードアート・オンライン
video.synopsis: A video game whiz helps create a new technology that enables players to guide their online avatars with their own bodies -- but a dark twist emerges.

episodes.synopsis: It's officially launch day as Sword Art Online -- one of the most eagerly awaited video games of all time -- is released.
episodes.title: The World of Swords

episodes.synopsis: Though the players have been locked in the game for a month, the first floor hasn't been cleared yet -- and 2,000 people have died.
episodes.title: Beater

episodes.synopsis: When Kirito joins a guild composed of close friends in reality, everything goes well -- until a tragic accident changes him completely.
episodes.title: The Red-Nosed Reindeer

episodes.synopsis: After quarreling with her party's leader, young beast-tamer Silica storms off but loses her way in the forest -- where she runs into monsters.
episodes.title: The Black Swordsman

episodes.synopsis: When a player is killed inside a safe zone, Asuna and Kirito take it upon themselves to find out how and why it happened.
episodes.title: Murder in the Safe Zone

episodes.synopsis: Kirito and Asuna investigate a murder that should have been impossible within the game -- only to see a new victim perish before their eyes.
episodes.title: Illusionary Avenger

episodes.synopsis: A customer arrives at Lisbeth's blacksmith shop, requesting that she make him the best sword possible.
episodes.title: The Temperature of the Heart

episodes.synopsis: After two years, players are used to living in the game. But with a dwindling frontline, it may be up to Kirito and Asuna to continue the charge.
episodes.title: The Sword Dance of Black and White

episodes.synopsis: Teaming with Asuna, Kirito clears the dungeon on the 74th floor. They discover the Boss Room but flee once they spot the boss.
episodes.title: The Blue-Eyed Demon

episodes.synopsis: With Asuna's freedom hanging in the balance, Kirito agrees to duel the leader of the Knights of the Blood Oath.
episodes.title: Crimson Killing Intent

episodes.synopsis: Newlyweds Kirito and Asuna are enjoying their time away from the frontlines -- but a new arrival soon takes them all the way back to the beginning.
episodes.title: The Girl of Morning Dew

episodes.synopsis: Yulier, the Liberation Army's second in command, asks Kirito and Asuna for help to save a friend -- and her guild.
episodes.title: Yui's Heart

episodes.synopsis: While enjoying a fishing tournament, Kirito receives an urgent message from the guild leader, requesting his return.
episodes.title: Edge of Hell's Abyss

episodes.synopsis: The battle against the Skull Reaper -- boss of the 75th floor -- turns out to be more ferocious than anyone imagined, yielding a host of casualties.
episodes.title: The End of the World

episodes.synopsis: Kirigaya is adjusting to life outside the game but hasn't forgotten about Asuna, who has yet to awaken.
episodes.title: Return

episodes.synopsis: Going in search of Asuna, Kirito joins a new MMO that allows users to fly -- and encourages player killing.
episodes.title: Land of the Fairies

episodes.synopsis: As Leafa schools Kirito about the game and the hatred between the races, Asuna learns the truth about her role from the fairy king.
episodes.title: Captive Queen

episodes.synopsis: Leafa makes enemies by leaving her group to team up with Kirito.
episodes.title: To the World Tree

episodes.synopsis: When Recon sends Leafa a cryptic message, will she and Kirito have time to figure it out before they come under attack?
episodes.title: The Lugru Corridor

episodes.synopsis: Kirito's plan to prevent a war between the races may work -- if he can survive a fight against a Salamander general.
episodes.title: General of the Blazing Flame

episodes.synopsis: Kirito and the others finally reach the largest city in Alfheim, located at the foot of the World Tree.
episodes.title: The Truth of Alfheim

episodes.synopsis: Kirito's determination to save Asuna borders on insanity. But his recklessness comes to a halt when Leafa suddenly logs out.
episodes.title: The Grand Quest

episodes.synopsis: Even though a wall has been built between Suguha and Kirito, he must save Asuna.
episodes.title: Bonds

episodes.synopsis: Kirito, Asuna and Yui are reunited, but the chains put on Asuna are unbreakable. Before they can devise a plan, the fairy king makes his entrance.
episodes.title: Gilded Hero

episodes.synopsis: Kazuto Kirigaya has beaten death twice, but there's one more thing he must do before he can see Asuna in the real world.
episodes.title: The World Seed
